content.raw:
cppzmq is included in the debian package, but it comes from a different repository:

* https://github.com/zeromq/cppzmq

it's not included in the homebrew zeromq package for example

I think it worked because it happens to be in the right search path, but if the file was deleted the build would fail

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/1a9c29ac2b91d134367fb268e384540bfd69f397/src/NodeShared.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#NodeShared.cc-21
content.html:
cppzmq is included in the debian package, but it comes from a different repository:

  • https://github.com/zeromq/cppzmq

it's not included in the homebrew zeromq package for example

I think it worked because it happens to be in the right search path, but if the file was deleted the build would fail

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/1a9c29ac2b91d134367fb268e384540bfd69f397/src/NodeShared.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#NodeShared.cc-21
